response.original_title: 超絶！！怖い心霊ベストビデオ

Some of the images introduced so far have even become the model for a certain famous meeting. We have carefully selected and recorded such footage that many people find terrifying. This is the luxurious BEST edition of the super-scary ghost videos of all time!
response.title: Super!! Scary Psychic Video: BEST
